description: Contains current inventory levels and stock holding information for each item.

columns.name: StockItemID
columns.description: Primary key and foreign key to Warehouse.StockItems.

columns.name: BinLocation
columns.description: Warehouse bin location for the item.

columns.name: LastCostPrice
columns.description: Cost price from most recent purchase.

columns.name: LastEditedBy
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for last editor.
